To start cloning you also have to download the license-free tool Parted Magic. Burn is to a bootable .iso-CD, .iso-DVD or bootable USB media:
Parted Magic / Clonezilla 2012_10 (recommended, for older and modern laptops)
Parted Magic / Clonezilla 2013_08 (when 2012_10 fails or very new laptop, e.g. with USB 3.0)
You will find more Parted Magic (PM) information on http://partedmagic.com (please do not download actual PM releases from this homepage, as you have to pay for these versions. Both PM releases listed above are still free to use.)
Please burn a bootable .iso-CD or USB-Stick.
You can as well watch all steps in our video tutorials on https://www.youtube.com/user/LabdooDACH:
English Part 1 - how to clone [video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKXJR94QIus] Part 2- after installation [video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AS8OJPJVPk8]
Deutsch Teil 1 - how to clone [video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1T9HeMBC4Hw] Teil 2 - Nach der Installation [video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2pLycKqTMbc]
Boot Parted Magic, select language / keyboard, start. If you miss to select your keyboard you have the option to change it when booted.
Sometimes you have to select certain options according to your hardware, e.g. for Pentium 4 CPU, Toshiba, Nvidia etc. It might happen that PM does not start correct without these setting or the monitor stays dark. Try VESA instead of X11 or the options in the Failsafe modus. It is as well explained in the above mentioned YouTube videos.
